name: Dungeon Sim
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  •  Mouse to Aim
  • Hold LeftMouseButton to build up throwing strength
  • Release LeftMouseButton to Throw the spear

Dungeon Sim is a 3D 3rd Person Isometric Action Roguelike for the PC.

In Dungeon Sim, you are stuck in a simulation. In order to survive you must fight hoards of skeletons, that are relentless, feel no pain, and only want to kill you. Civilians also roam the simulation, they are scared and cannot defend themselves. You may choose to kill them and replenish your health. But killing the civilians might result in unfavorable ending at the end of the wave. 

The choices you make while inside, will affect the game so choose wisely.
